ygData.messageBody:
> Here is my take. I would remove the pets (they are just a novelty to me
and have no use in group play [my primary style of play]) and replace them
with an equivalent powered lifetap series. Correct choice of which version
of the spell would be important. The damage/heal of the lifetap should be
greater in power than the damage that the pet does because the pet only
needs to be summoned once whereas lifetap must be cast throughout the
combat. This will result in slightly less downtime between battles, but
will be balanced by the fact that we will need to mediatate to get the mana
back that we used to cast the lifetaps.

Abso-friggin-lutely! Eat it, Beld! =P

Oh, and that no-pet-throw-me-a-bone joke was just... bad. <g>

Dravith Vandre'i
